SELECT ECCR.GATE_CD ,ECCR.FORM_NUM ,ECCF2.FORM_NUM AS REL_FORM_NUM ,ECCR.REL_FORM_SQ ,ECCF2.FORM_NM AS REL_FORM_NM ,ECCR.REQUIRE_FLAG ,ECCF2.FORM_TEXT_NUM FROM STOCECCF ECCF JOIN STOCECCR ECCR ON (ECCF.GATE_CD = ECCR.GATE_CD AND ECCF.FORM_NUM = ECCR.FORM_NUM) JOIN STOCECCF ECCF2 ON (ECCR.GATE_CD = ECCF2.GATE_CD AND ECCR.REL_FORM_NUM = ECCF2.FORM_NUM) WHERE ECCF.GATE_CD = #{ses.gateCd} AND ECCF.FORM_NUM = #{FORM_NUM} AND ECCF.DEL_FLAG = '0' AND ECCR.DEL_FLAG = '0' ORDER BY ECCR.FORM_NUM ASC, ECCR.REL_FORM_SQ ASC

SELECT FORM_NUM, FORM_TYPE, FORM_NM, DEPT_CD, FORM_TEXT_NUM, GETDEPTNAME(GATE_CD, BUYER_CD, DEPT_CD, #{ses.langCd}) AS DEPT_NM FROM STOCECCF WHERE GATE_CD = #{ses.gateCd} AND BUYER_CD = #{ses.companyCd} AND FORM_NUM = #{FORM_NUM} AND DEL_FLAG = '0'

SELECT (CASE WHEN ECCR.FORM_NUM = NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) SELECTED, ECCF.FORM_NUM AS REL_FORM_NUM, ECCF.FORM_TYPE, ECCF.FORM_NM, ECCR.FORM_NUM, ECCR.REQUIRE_FLAG FROM STOCECCF ECCF LEFT OUTER JOIN STOCECCR ECCR ON ECCF.GATE_CD = ECCR.GATE_CD AND ECCF.FORM_NUM = ECCR.REL_FORM_NUM AND ECCR.FORM_NUM = #{FORM_NUM} AND ECCR.DEL_FLAG = '0' WHERE ECCF.GATE_CD = #{ses.gateCd} AND ECCF.FORM_NUM != #{FORM_NUM} AND ECCF.DEL_FLAG = '0' ORDER BY ECCF.FORM_NUM
